title: Ticket #7521: p-slot child rollup should contain evaluated d-slot values
description:
When a custom d-slot attribute is rolled up into the p-slot, if the attribute value is an expression, the code currently puts the expression into the Child<Attr> list. This will almost certainly result in those list members evaluating to undefined, since they will refer to attributes in the d-slot and not in the p-slot.

To fix this, we should evaluate the d-slot attribute values, and put the resulting literal values into the p-slots Child<Attr> attribute.
remarks:
